attributes.action: Petition to end the media blackout on the pedophile ring leading from policemen, to politicians, to people of governmental standing
attributes.additional_details: It seems as if, since the shocking revelations of Jimmy Saville and his associates, the media has chosen to forget what they started to uncover, they have no finished their prolonged story. This disgusting man, had high links with people in the NHS, in social care, in the police force, and even in the houses of parliament! Our media started this, and our media has chosen to forget the can of worms sitting on the side squirming. Now is the time for us to stand up and say 'lets finish this story'
